          <title>
            <string language="en">Combustion reaction in a motorbike engine cylinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbrennungreaktion in einem Motorradmaschine 
Zylinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de combustion dans un cylindre de 
moteur de motocyclette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação da combustão em um cilindro do motor do
motorbike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione di combustione in un cilindro del motore
della motocicletta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση καύσης σε έναν κύλινδρο μηχανών 
μοτοσικλετών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción de la combustión en un cilindro del 
motor de la moto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the combustion reaction of petrol and air mixture in a motorbike engine cylinder.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Verbrennungreaktion der
Treibstoff- und Luftmischung in einem Motorradmaschine Zylinder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réaction de 
combustion du mélange d'essence et d'air dans un cylindre de moteur 
de motocyclette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reação da combustão
da mistura do petrol e do ar em um cilindro do motor do motorbike.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la reazione di 
combustione della miscela dell'aria e della benzina in un cilindro del
motore della motocicletta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αντίδραση καύσης του 
μίγματος βενζίνης και αέρα σε έναν κύλινδρο μηχανών 
μοτοσικλετών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reacción de la 
combustión de la mezcla de la gasolina y del aire en un cilindro del 
motor de la moto.</string>
          </description>
